allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix risk assessment logic and ensure high-risk onboarding is classified correctly

- Fix mapSourceOfWealth\(\) to properly map all frontend values \(was defaulting to SALARY instead of OTHER\)
- Add comprehensive logging to risk assessment for debugging
- Replace mock data in AdminUsersPage with real API calls to /portal/customers
- Add new backend endpoint for fetching all customers regardless of status
- Fix field name mismatches \(weighted_score, calculated_at\) in portal router
- Make tenant_id optional in AuditLogResponse for SYSTEM events
- Add external_id support to customer schemas

Risk scoring now correctly applies:
- PEP status: +50 points
- Non-EU country: +30 points
- High-risk source \(LOTTERY, CRYPTO, OTHER\): +20 points

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
